Articles.Content:
Hey devs. After the ESA updates came out a month later the performance of KSP has dramatically dropped. Like very dramatically. I play on the PlayStaion4 with a lots of storage to spare. Yet when I launch my rockets into space the game start the lag and freeze! In space the FPS drops to 2 Frames per Second. This is very hard to create menuvers nodes or just looking at my craft. Not to be mean, but please if this! KSP is getting to the point of  UN-PLAYABLE! Please fix and go over the performance on KSP? And please do it quick! I even deleted all my save files to fix this. Yet it doesn’t to work! Please fix this! Please fix ASAP! Please!   And my ship only had 30 parts!

Edited December 16, 2020 by Dr. Kerbal
!

2 minutes ago, Dr. Kerbal said:

Hey devs. After the ESA updates came out a month later the performance of KSP has dramatically dropped. Like very dramatically. I play on the PlayStaion4 with a lots of storage to spare. Yet when I launch my rockets into space the game start the lag and freeze! In space the FPS drops to 2 Frames per Second. This is very hard to create menuvers nodes or just looking at my craft. Not to be mean, but please if this! KSP is getting to the point of  UN-PLAYABLE! Please fix and go over the performance on KSP? And please do it quick! I even deleted all my save files to fix this. Yet it doesn’t to work! Please fix this! Please fix ASAP! Please!  

What's your part count? I don't have issues like that on xbox unless I'm flying a craft with hundreds of parts. But generally frame rate is fine

10 hours ago, ConArt70 said:

What's your part count? I don't have issues like that on xbox unless I'm flying a craft with hundreds of parts. But generally frame rate is fine

30 parts.

50 minutes ago, Dr. Kerbal said:

30 parts.

Hmm, something is amiss there then. I would start by reinstalling the game, you shouldn't be getting 2fps with a 30 part vessel.
Your issue has been moved to the support sub for the console version, and good luck with it.
I have been experimenting and seeing what is the reason. So far. Everything seems alright. But I don’t have many thing I pin space.
I also experience this issue since last update, on xbox one.  The game is more or less unplayable. :(

I have relieved with more testing that after the update the game files become corrupted when experience game crashes while playing with the game file. This means that if your are playing KSP and your game crashes, the game file could become currupted after the game crashing. This als seeems to lead to more crashing. My solution was to delete all corrupted files and start a new save file.
